page.title: 11Senior Citizens in Calbourne
page.content: As a{SENIOR CITIZEN}living in a small village community, life is quiet but far from dull. A sewing group meets every fortnight where handicrafts are made for the annual village Sale on the Green. We help with Fetes, Flower Festivals and Coffee mornings for our local church. We have a very active Womens Institute, which meets once a month, there is also an Institute Choir. Our well-stocked village shop is supported by the elderly, who also collect their pensions from the Post Office. Several senior citizens visit local urban areas to participate in Bingo. Meals on wheels are available should they be required by the older members of the community.
